verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: may] not want the U.S. to participate in international climate initiatives , but the leader of one small Louisiana city on the Mississippi River thinks that ’s a mistake

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: may] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: want] [ARG1: the U.S. to participate in international climate initiatives] , but the leader of one small Louisiana city on the Mississippi River thinks that ’s a mistake

President Donald Trump may not want [ARG0: the U.S.] to [V: participate] [ARG1: in international climate initiatives] , but the leader of one small Louisiana city on the Mississippi River thinks that ’s a mistake

President Donald Trump may not want the U.S. to participate in international climate initiatives , but [ARG0: the leader of one small Louisiana city on the Mississippi River] [V: thinks] [ARG1: that ’s a mistake]

President Donald Trump may not want the U.S. to participate in international climate initiatives , but the leader of one small Louisiana city on the Mississippi River thinks [ARG1: that] [V: ’s] [ARG2: a mistake]
